headerDisplay: Delay switch platform for Homebridge, with or without a random delay

name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the homebridge log.

name.title: Name of the switch
name.description: Name of the switch. The motion sensor name will be appended with 'Trigger'.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: The delay in seconds after which the motion sensor is triggered. (max. 3600 seconds)

minDelay.title: Minimum Delay
minDelay.description: The minimum value for a random delay in seconds (set to less than the delay)

random.title: Random Delay
random.description: The delay will be a random value from the minimum delay to the delay value above.

disableSensor.title: Disable Sensor
disableSensor.description: The motion sensor will be disabled.

startOnReboot.title: Turn On when Homebridge restarts
startOnReboot.description: When Enabled, the switch will be turned On and start the timer when Homebridge server restarts

repeats.title: Repetitions
repeats.description: The number of times the delay switch is activated after the first activation (0 - 10)
